name: deformdemo
description: Demonstration application for Deform form library.
full_description:
# Deform Demo

[Deform](https://docs.pylonsproject.org/projects/deform/en/latest/)  is a Python HTML form generation library. It runs under Python 2.x, 3.x and PyPy.

This image implements a demonstration application using Deform.

## Features

- Comprehensive demo application implementing all Deform widgets.
- Mini example of a simple form.

## Supported tags and respective `Dockerfile` links

- [`v2.0.7` (*2.0.7/Dockerfile*)](https://github.com/pylons/deformdemo/blob/2.0.7/dockerfiles/Dockerfile)

## Prerequisites

- [Docker](https://www.docker.com)

## Usage

Currently we implement two demos. For both of them, start a Docker container in the background (using the `-d` option) and expose the application on http://localhost:8000/.

### Comprehensive demo

Start the container in the background with the following command.

```console
docker run -d -p 8000:8522 pylons/deformdemo:v2.0.7
```


Visit http://localhost:8000/.

### Mini demo

Start the container in the background with the following command.

```console
docker run -d -p 8000:8522 pylons/deformdemo:v2.0.7 mini
```


Visit http://localhost:8000/.
